programme.title: American Assassin
programme.desc: A CIA black-ops recruit uses his lethal skills to try and stop a rogue operative with a deadly agenda.

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: A notorious arms dealer sells weapons to dictators and successfully outruns the law for nearly twenty years.

programme.title: All the Devil's Men
programme.desc: An American bounty hunter is forced to go to London on a manhunt for a disavowed CIA operative.

programme.title: Ticker
programme.desc: After a detective's partner is murdered by Northern Irish terrorists, the officer joins the bomb squad.

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: Stanley Hill opens a can of vengeance on the thugs who murdered his wife and the corrupt cops protecting them.

programme.title: I Am Vengeance
programme.desc: When a mercenary learns of the murder of his best friend, he sets off on a mission to find out what happened.

programme.title: I Am Vengeance: Retaliation
programme.desc: Ex-special forces soldier John Gold agrees to retrieve a hated foe in exchange for an expunged record.

programme.title: Final Score
programme.desc: After terrorists abduct his niece, an ex-soldier with lethal fighting skills wages a one-man war to save her.
